description:
*This is an in-person event*

Hosted by **OVO Energy** - [https://www.ovoenergy.com/](https://www.ovoenergy.com/)
OVO: We're helping millions of customer use less. And we can help you do the same

Sponsored by **Microsoft** (as part of the **Global AI Conference**) - [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.ovoenergy.com/)

**Global AI Conference** (Around the world): [https://globalai.community/events/global-ai-conference-december-2023/](https://www.ovoenergy.com/)

Location: Temple Quay, 1 Rivergate, Redcliffe, Bristol BS1 6ED

IMPORTANT: Attendees will need to bring their own laptop

AGENDA
**17.15 – 17:30 Meet & Greet**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**17:30 - 19:10 AzureOpenAIService Workshop:**
This session is a workshop of interaction with the OpenAI model ChatGPT (gpt-3.5-turbo).

The goal of this workshop is to:

* Understand the implementation and capabilities of ChatGPT
* Learn how to use and customize natural language generative AI models using prompt engineering techniques

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**19:10 - 20:30 Pizza and Networking**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Photos**
*We ask that you do NOT take photos at this meetup.*

We will invite people to be included in a group photo/s during the event. Speakers will let you know if it's okay to photograph their presentation (excluding other attendees).

You may see organisers taking photos during the talks. These will be of speakers, if they have agreed to this, and will not include faces of attendees.
title: Azure OpenAI Service Workshop
